articles.title: UPDATE 1-Dry weather pushes down Argentina's wheat harvest forecast
articles.description: (Adds details from the statement)BUENOS AIRES, July 13 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat harvest for the 2022/23 season is expected at 17.7 million tonnes, down from a previous estimate of 18.5 million tonnes, the Rosario Grains Exchange (BCR) said late on Wednesday.The decrease comes due to a drop in the estimated planting area because of a drought in agricultural areas. articles.title: Dry weather seen pushing down Argentina's wheat harvest forecast
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, July 13 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat harvest for the 2022/23 season is expected to be about 17.7 million tonnes, down from a previous estimate of 18.5 million tonnes, the Rosario Grains Exchange (BCR) said on Wednesday.The exchange also revised up its 2021/22 season forecast for corn production to 51 million tonnes from 49.2 million. articles.title: FIH Women's Hockey World Cup: Australia, Argentina Complete Semi-Final Line Up
articles.description: The hockey action resumes on Saturday 16 July with the two semi-finals. The first match at the Estadio Olimpic de Terrassa will be the Netherlands versus Australia at 18:30 CEST. That match will be followed by the encounter between Germany and Argentina at 21:30 CEST

articles.title: Football rumours: Ajax accept loss of Man United target Lisandro Martinez
articles.description: The Dutch club are said to want about £46m for the Argentina defender, who has also been approached by Arsenal.

articles.title: Argentina farm groups hold 24-hour strike; grains transport unaffected

articles.description: Man Utd are close to agreeing a deal for Ajaxs Lisandro Martinez; Argentina international, who can play at centre-back, left-back and in central midfield is also wanted by Arsenal, and has excelled since his arrival in Holland in 2019

articles.title: Middlesbrough admit defeat after striking agreement to send £6m signing Martin Payero overseas
articles.description: Middlesbrough have agreed a deal with Boca Juniors that will see Martin Payero move back to Argentina, TEAMtalk understands.
articles.content:
Middlesbrough have agreed a deal with Boca Juniors that will see Martin Payero move back to Argentina, TEAMtalk understands.
The 23-year-old joined Middlesbrough from Argentine side Banfield last summer. Payero cost £6m – a significant sum for a Cham... [941 chars]

articles.title: Pope: I wouldn't live in Vatican or Argentina if I retire
articles.description: Pope: I wouldn't live in Vatican or Argentina if I retire
articles.content:
ROME: Pope Francis said he would not live in the Vatican or return to his native Argentina if and when he ever retires, but would instead like to find a church in Rome where he could continue hearing confessions.
